metadata.title: CVE-2024-38603 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  drivers/perf: hisi: hns3: Actually use devm_add_action_or_reset()  pci_alloc_irq_vectors() allocates an irq vector. When devm_add_action() fails, the irq vector is not freed, which leads to a memory leak.  Replace the devm_add_action with devm_add_action_or_reset to ensure the irq vector can be destroyed when it fails.
